claim_summary: The Medicaid DUR Board bylaws describe the board’s legal authority under 42 U.S.C. § 1396r–8(g)(3) and 42 CFR § 456.716, establish board composition (five physicians, seven or eight pharmacists, and PASSE representatives), and note that members must be appointed by the Medicaid Director and adhere to conflict-of-interest rules【259783752909853†L52-L102】.

source.title: Arkansas Medicaid Drug Utilization Review Board Bylaws (July 2025)
source.issuing_body: Arkansas Department of Human Services, Division of Medical Services
